PATIENT_ID.description: The unique patient identifier for the GENIE project.

SEX.description: The sex code for the patient

PRIMARY_RACE.description: The primary race recorded for the patient

SECONDARY_RACE.description: The second race recorded for the patient

TERTIARY_RACE.description: The third race code for the patient

ETHNICITY.description: Indication of Spanish/Hispanic origin of the patient

BIRTH_YEAR.description: The four digit year associated with the patient's date of birth

YEAR_CONTACT.description: Record the year that the patient is last known to be alive - data to be derived from information including and EHR, tumor registry, or other system

INT_CONTACT.description: Interval in days from DOB to date of last contact

INT_DOD.description: Interval in days from DOB to DOD.

DEAD.description: Is this patient known to be deceased

SAMPLE_ID.description: The unique sample identifier for the GENIE project.

AGE_AT_SEQ_REPORT.description: The interval in days between the patient's date of birth and the date of the sequencing report that is associated with the sample.

ONCOTREE_CODE.description: The OncoTree diagnosis code using the format found in parenthesis, from the posted Oncotree version. (ie. Adrenal Gland (ADRENAL_GLAND), use ADRENAL_GLAND)

SAMPLE_TYPE.description: The specimen's type based on its location, including primary site, site of local recurrence, or distant metastasis.

SEQ_ASSAY_ID.description: The institutional assay identifier for genomic testing platform

SEQ_DATE.description: Each record has a date of sequencing including a month and year (this should be anonymized following the procedure below). For Jan-March: use Jan-YEAR. For Apr-June: use Apr-YEAR. For July-Sep: use Jul-YEAR. For Oct-Dec: use Oct-YEAR. Legacy data that does not have SEQ_DATE that can be released should be labelled as 'release'.
